desc: Simple object oriented programming language. Version 1.0 is out now but not capable of
loops or conditions. Also functions not contained by an object are still buggy.
A fusion game between Tetris, Space Invaders, Block Breaker and Pong.
Try to shoot as many invaders as possible, destroy the most blocks, survive
the longest and lose the fewest balls before the entire screen is covered in Tetris blocks.

python-gps-logger.desc: Tool to log uart gps data on a RaspberryPi.

clojure-gps-aggregator.desc: Program to crunch a bunch of gps data gathered from the python-gps-logger project.

desc: A school project for learning Java GUIs and PostgreSQL. The goal is to build a small
control software for a hotel including guests, rooms, staff and salary.

dedda.github.io.desc: Deddas Github Page. Basically the thing you're staring at right now...

DBAL.desc: Small database abstraction layer based on annotations.
